pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.management

Class Services

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.management.Services

  • public class Services
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper used to manage the services and plugins remotely through the web environment/app.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Services getInstance()
        Returns the current instance of this class.

      • processAdvancedSettings

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> processAdvancedSettings(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> originalSettings,
                                                                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> newSettings)
        This converts and applies the new textual values into the originalSettings HashMap, taking into account their original class/type. Only the settings that exist on both Maps are updated, this avoid invalid settings and Class type injections from happening.
        Parameters:
        originalSettings - the original advanced/internal settings of a plugin or service.
        newSettings - the new settings to apply.
        Returns:
        the originalSettings HashMap with the new values in place (you can use the reference passed as originalSettings instead if you want, they will allways be the same).

      • performAction

        @Deprecated
public int performAction(int action,
                                     java.lang.String svcName,
                                     boolean initStart,
                                     int port,
                                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> advSettings)
        Deprecated. 
        Performs a certain action to a service or plugin.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to perform.
        svcName - the name of the service or plugin to perform the action at.
        initStart - the init-start param value.
        port - the set-port param value.
        advSettings - a HashMap with all the advanced settings and their values.
        Returns:
        an int value indicating what was wrong with the call (see Services.RES_* for values/name pairs)

      • performAction

        public int performAction(HttpServletRequest request)
                  throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Performs a certain action to a service or plugin, and save the settings if needed.
        Parameters:
        request - the request object.
        Returns:
        an int value indicating what was wrong with the call (see Services.RES_* for values/name pairs).
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • processServletRequest

        public void processServletRequest(HttpServletRequest request,
                                  HttpServletResponse response)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Processes a request from a servlet to perform an action on a service or plugin.
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request object.
        response - the servlet response object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error while attempting to perform the requested action.

      • processWebappRequest

        public int processWebappRequest(HttpServletRequest request,
                                HttpServletResponse response)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Processes a request from a webapp to perform an action on a service or plugin.
        Parameters:
        request - the webapp request object.
        response - the webapp response object.
        Returns:
        an int value that represents theresult of the operation performed (see Services.RES_* for values/name pairs).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error while attempting to perform the requested action.

      • getHTMLServiceManagementTable

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getHTMLServiceManagementTable(java.lang.String brokerURL,
                                                                  java.lang.String advancedOptionsManagerURL,
                                                                  java.lang.String id)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns an HTML String containing the list of all plugins and services available, their status and action that can be taken.
        Parameters:
        brokerURL - the URL of the service manager page (where the form will post data to).
        advancedOptionsManagerURL - the URL of the plugin/service advanced/internal options manager.
        id - the ID of this HTML element, can be null if not needed.
        Returns:
        an HTML String containing the list of all plugins and services available, their status and action that can be taken.

      • getHTMLServiceManagementTable

        Parameters:

        advancedOptionsManagerURL - the URL of the plugin/service advanced/internal options manager.
        Returns:
        an HTML String containing the list of all plugins and services available, their status and action that can be taken.

      • getHTMLSettingHelp

        public java.lang.String getHTMLSettingHelp(java.lang.String fieldTitle,

      • getHTMLAdvancedSettingsFormRow

        public java.lang.String getHTMLAdvancedSettingsFormRow(java.lang.String name,
                                                       java.lang.Object value,
                                                       java.lang.String help)
        Returns a row for the advanced settings form.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the setting.
        value - the type/value of the setting.
        help - s String containing a help notice for this setting, can be null if not needed.
        Returns:
        a String containing a HTML code to a row for the advanced settings form.

      • getHTMLServiceAdvancedSettingsForm

        public java.lang.String getHTMLServiceAdvancedSettingsForm(HttpServletRequest request,
                                                           java.lang.String brokerURL,
                                                           java.lang.String elementID)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Based on the request, returns a String containing a form with all the settings inputs boxes. These boxes are rendered/specified in accordance with the each setting value type reported by the plugin/service.
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request object.
        brokerURL - the URL of the broker that will apply the settings after receiving this forms post.
        elementID - the ID of this HTML form, can be null.
        Returns:
        a String containing the HTML structure for the form with all the plugin advanced setting.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
